price: 19. Ezali te тропа ye kosepelisa moko o’kati ya bato.
arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā li-aḥadin ʿindahu min niʿ'matin tuj'zā
